title.rendered: How to use the mini camera HD video recorder – video –

content.rendered:
How to use the Mini HD camera and video recorder

Trilix
Accessories


Full high definition, grandangolo 155 gradi, wi-fi, visione notturna, 1h 30′ di autonomi.

Full HD 1080p, Gran Angular 155 grados, wi-fi, vision nocturna, 1h y 30′ de autonomía.

Full HD 1080p, wide angle 155 degrees, wi-fi, infrared for night vision, 1 hour and 30 minutes autonomy.
